import { Box, Button, Container, TextField } from '@mui/material'; import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import SideBar from '../sideBar/SideBar'; import axios from 'axios'; import { getToken } from '../utils/localStorageUtil'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router'; const AddEtudiant = () => { let navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.currentTarget); await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/etudiant', { firstName: data.get('firstname'), lastName: data.get('lastname'), dateNaissance: data.get('dateNaissance'), note1: data.get('note1'), note2: data.get('note2'), }, {headers: { "token": `Bearer ${getToken()}` }}) .then(res => { console.log(res) navigate('/dashboard') }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) /*console.log({ firstName:data.get('firstname'), lastName:data.get('lastname'), dateNaissance:data.get('dateNaissance'), note1:data.get('note1'), note2:data.get('note2') })*/ } return (
); }; export default AddEtudiant;
